text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-relatedclaimrelationship
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    priorPrior ClaimA prior claim instance for the same intended suite of services.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBRelatedClaimRelationshipCodes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    replacedbyReplaced by claim numberThe current claim has been adjusted; i.e., replaced by or merged to another claim number.

name: C4BBRelatedClaimRelationshipCodes
title: C4BB Related Claim Relationship Codes Value Set
description: Identifies if the current claim represents a claim that has been adjusted and was given a prior claim number or if the current claim has been adjusted; i.e., replaced by or merged to another claim number.
